amendment.description: To ensure full and uninterrupted funding for Department of Veterans Affairs health care and benefits provided by the Sergeant First Class Heath Robinson Honoring our Promise to Address Comprehensive Toxics Act of 2022 (Public Law 117-168), also known as the "PACT Act", preventing any cuts or delays.

vote.text: Amendment SA 659 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 83.

action.text: Amendment SA 659 proposed by Senator Blumenthal.
